(Simplified: 镌)
Chinese Definition:
①雕刻，鑿：鐫刻。鐫鏤。
②規勸：鐫說(勸說)。鐫諭(規勸曉諭)。
③降級，削職：鐫級。鐫罰。鐫汰(裁減冗官)。
鐫刻 [ juān kè ]: to engrave
鐫心銘骨 [ juān xīn míng gǔ ]: etched in one's bones and heart (idiom); ever-present memory (esp. resentment)
鐫鏤 [ juān lòu ]: to engrave
鐫骨銘心 [ juān gǔ míng xīn ]: etched in one's bones and heart (idiom); ever-present memory (esp. resentment)
(Simplified: 镌)
Chinese Definition:
Hanzi: 镌

鐫字的基本解释

鐫
juān
同“镌”。

鐫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juān］
［《廣韻》子泉切，平仙，精。］
亦作“鋑3”。亦作“鎸1”。亦作“鑴2”。
(1)凿；雕刻。
(2)指刻板印刷。
(3)指刊物。
(4)比喻铭记。
(5)指精心写作。
(6)规劝；晓喻。
(7)蠲减；降低。
(8)指谪降。
(9)削除；除去。
(10)古兵器名。用以破木。

鐫字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鐫； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1323第16
【唐韻】【正韻】子全切【集韻】【韻會】遵全切，?音鋑。【說文】穿木鐫也。【釋名】鐫，鐏也。有所鐏入也。　又【廣韻】鑽也，斲也。【揚子·方言】㧻也。晉趙謂之鐫。【前漢·溝洫志】可鐫廣之。【註】鐫，謂琢鑿之。【淮南子·本經訓】鐫山石。【註】鐫，猶鑿也。【抱朴子·臣節卷】昆吾彝器，能者鐫勳。【庾信·枯樹賦】雕鐫始就，剞劂仍加。　又【正韻】謫也。【正字通】中外官，降級曰鐫級。又【說文】一曰瑑石也。【正字通】瑑圭璧上起?瑑也。今刻石文曰瑑石。　又【集韻】將廉切，音尖。錐也。亦作鋑?。　又【集韻】子兗切，音臇。【博雅】鑿也。

鐫字的源字形

鐫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
engrave
juān
Same as "engraving".
engrave
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juān］
["Guangyun" Ziquan cut, flat fairy, fine. ]
Also known as "鋑3". Also known as "鎸1". Also known as "鑴2".
(1) Chiseling; carving.
(2) Refers to stereotype printing.
(3) Refers to publications.
(4) Remembering metaphorically.
(5) Refers to careful writing.
(6) Advise; understand.
(7) Decrease; decrease.
(8) Refers to banished.
(9) Cut; remove.
(10) Names of ancient weapons. Used to break wood.
engrave
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　镌; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1323 Page 16
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Zi Quan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zun Quan cut,? Yin Yun. [Said the text] also wear wood engraving. [Release name] Engrave, 鐏也. Something to enter also.　[Guangyun] Drilling, shirking. 【Yangtze Dialect】㧻 also. Jin and Zhao said it was engraved. [Previous Han·Gou Xia Zhi] Can be widely used. [Note] Engraving is said to be cut out. 【Huainanzi·Ben Jingxun】engraved with mountains and rocks. [Note] Engraving is still chiseling. 【Baopuzi·Chen Festival Volume】Kunwu Yi implements, those who are capable are enchanted. 【Xin Yu·Fu of the Dead Tree】The carving is done at the beginning, but the carving is still added.　[Zheng Yun] Ye Ye. 【Zhengzitong】Chinese and foreign officials are downgraded as enrolled. [Said the text] One said that the stone is also. [Zhengzitong] Rong Kyubi up? Rong Ye. Today's stone inscriptions are called 瑑石.　[Jiyun] Cut Lian, the sound tip. Cone also. Also known as 鋑?.　 [Ji Yun] Zi Yan cut, sound stunned. [Bo Ya] Chisel too.
